description: Former Mouseketeer and hit singer Christina Aguilera reportedly had an altercation with Mickey Mouse at Disneyland recently, which ended with the pop singer calling him an "asshole."
title: You're an 'a**hole'
title_page: Christina Aguilera to Mickey Mouse at Disneyland: You're an 'a**hole'
text:
Former Mouseketeer and hit singer Christina Aguilera reportedly had an altercation with Mickey Mouse at Disneyland recently, which ended with the pop singer calling him an “asshole.”
TMZ reported that Aguilera became irate after Mickey refused to take a photograph with her entourage.
Mickey’s reluctance reportedly led to a series of verbal threats, leading the singer to ask a costumed man, “Do you know who I am?”
Officials at the fun park reportedly rushed Mickey to a “safe zone” soon after to avoid any further confrontation.
Aguilera must have quickly forgotten her runin with Mickey, as she soon shared a photo of herself smiling with friends at Disney on her Instagram.
“Fun birthday celebration at the happiest place on earth #disneyland,” she captioned the picture.
